name: Purgatory Fire Slash
effects: Hybrid fire damage (7.5x, ATK & MAG) to one enemy
Reduce resistance to Fire by 50% for 3 turns to one enemy

name: Purgatory Fire Slash

desc_long: Deals fire damage and reduces fire resistance for one enemy.
對1名敵人發動火屬性攻擊，並降低火屬性耐性的數值。
적 1명에게 불속성 피해를 주고 불속성 저항력을 감소시킵니다.
